short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace mentions of the alt right with neo nazi.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looks at a glossary of terms and then changes them to what they really mean.

I made this in about 30 minutes after seeing a tweet about it. Reality follows art. Have questions? Don't ask them on Twitter @russ_sm.

Release notes: 
0.7 - Added gerbils and black magic 
0.6 - Updated word mapping to be more concise 
0.5 - Updated glossary of hatred 
0.4 - Changed the icon so I don't get into trouble
0.3 - I broke something dumb in 0.2
0.2 - I added an asterisks to denote when something is altered because @MackFlavelle thought it was a little too good at word masking.
